snippet.title: The Cult: Marduk's Longest Night - Official Trailer - Indie Point & Click Adventure Game
snippet.description:
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1074220/The_Cult_Marduks_Longest_Night/

The Cult: Marduk's Longest Night is a story driven point & click adventure game filled with dark magic and dry humor

In a world where nothing is as it seems, join Caleb Marduk in a race against time to find his daughter. Explore Harvester City's slums, meet demons and legendary creatures, escape the summoners of the Cult and delve into Marduk's shadowy past in the first episode of his adventures.
